definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The error of magnetic compass is not adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 磁羅經的誤差沒有校正。

sentences.english: Take celestial azimuth and find compass error on each watch if the weather is fine.
sentences.chinese: 如天氣好，每一班測取天體方位求出羅經差。

sentences.english: Don't look too much at the compass. Get a good mark on shore.
sentences.chinese: 不要總看羅經，要找出岸上顯著物標。

sentences.english: Check Gyro and Magnetic courses frequently.
sentences.chinese: 經常覈對陀螺羅經和磁羅經航向。

sentences.english: Check Gyro and Magnetic courses frequently.
sentences.chinese: 經常覈對陀螺羅經和磁羅經航向。

sentences.english: Application of fuzzy control in platform gyrocompass is studied.
sentences.chinese: 平臺羅經模糊控制的應用研究。

sentences.english: The gyro isn't up to standard. Please give us a certificate so that we can make a claim on the shipyard.
sentences.chinese: 羅經達不到標準，請給我們出具證明以便向船廠索賠。

sentences.english: Calibration constant error and function for gyro-compass on sea trial.
sentences.chinese: 航行試驗中電羅經固定誤差校正和效用試驗。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony of China-Romania Economic and Trade Forum was held in a meeting hall of the Parliament Palace.
sentences.chinese: 中羅經貿研討會開幕式在議會宮羅塞蒂廳舉行。

sentences.english: She is equipped with a gyrocompass.
A new type of computer control system for platform gyrocompass is designed and realized.
sentences.chinese: 新型平臺羅經計算機控制系統的設計和實現。

sentences.english: The course indication of repeaters does not match that of gyro compass.
sentences.chinese: 主羅經和分羅經航向示度不匹配。

sentences.english: The course indication of repeaters does not match that of gyro compass.
sentences.chinese: 主羅經和分羅經航向示度不匹配。
